sentences.en: A quart of milk got sucked up inside my girdle.
sentences.cn: 一夸脱牛奶被我的内衣裤吸乾了.

sentences.en: As a gift, he brought a big fish and a quart of the largest oysters I had ever seen.
sentences.cn: 他给我们带来了一条大鱼还有一夸脱海蛎子，我从来没见过那么大的海蛎子。

sentences.en: He drank a quart of milk.
I ll get a quart of milk [ right away ].
sentences.cn: 我(这就)去捎 [ 买 ] 回来一夸脱牛奶.

sentences.en: In the Civic Center Park, across from thePublic Library Building, he drank almost a quart of water and felt himselfrefreshed.
sentences.cn: 在公共图书馆对面的城市中心公园里，他喝了差不多一夸脱水，觉得自己又清醒了。

sentences.en: It took a quart of oil and needed some water.
sentences.cn: 加了一夸脱机油,还有一些水.

sentences.en: It's just a little Below the full nark. It'll take about a quart.
sentences.cn: 刚好略低于注满标记. 需要再加大约1夸脱.

sentences.en: Je suis m ê me arriv é e un quart d'heure en avance!
sentences.cn: 我甚至提前了一刻钟到的.

sentences.en: Pick up a quart of milk or a loaf of bread.
sentences.cn: 拿1夸脱牛奶或一条面包。

sentences.en: That glass will contain a quart of beer.
sentences.cn: 那个杯子可容一夸脱啤酒.

sentences.en: The guardian found a quarterly quart of quartz in the safeguard.
sentences.cn: 监护人在安全装置内找到了四分之一夸脱石英.

sentences.en: The quarrelsome general quarreled about a quarter quart of oil in the headquarters.
sentences.cn: 好争持的将军正在司令部为四分之一夸脱油而争持。

sentences.en: There is a quart of milk left in the pail.
sentences.cn: 桶里还剩下一夸脱牛奶.

sentences.en: They polished off a quart of vodka between them.
sentences.cn: 他们两人很快就喝完了一夸脱伏特加酒.

sentences.en: This juice - about a quart a day -- pours into my duodenum, neutralizing acids.
sentences.cn: 这种消化液(每天约分泌1品脱)流入我的十二指肠, 把酸中和了.

sentences.en: Use warm water and baking soda solution about a tablespoon (15ml) of baking soda to a quart (1 liter) of water. This both cleans and neutralizes odors. Rinse and wipe dry.
sentences.cn: 使用温水和碳酸氢钠溶液，其配比为一大汤勺（15毫升）碳酸氢钠比一夸脱（1升）水。这会清洁并中和异味。用清水冲洗，擦干。

sentences.en: You can't put a quart into a pint pot.
sentences.cn: 你不能做那不可能的事.

sentences.en: You're one quart low. What kind shall I put in?
sentences.cn: 你的润滑油少了一夸特. 要加哪一种牌子的?

sentences.en: Your water's fine but you're down about a quart of oil.
sentences.cn: 水还足够,但是机油少了约一夸脱.

words.tran_cn: 四分之一；地区；季度；一刻钟；两角五分；节；vi. 住宿；驻扎；vt. 将…四等分；供某人住宿；num. 四分之一

phrases.phrase: you can't get a quart into a pint pot

trans.tran_cn: 夸脱（液体或固体的容积单位）
trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring liquid, equal to two pints. In Britain this is 1.14 litres, and in the US it is 0.95 litres.
